description: Try our easy to follow Chorizo & Cheese Puffs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Hot canapés,Sausage,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Chorizo & Cheese Puffs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper.
Finely dice the chorizos and fry in olive oil in a hot frying pan until golden. Drain well on paper towel.

Place butter, 1/2 cup water and salt in a saucepan over medium-high heat. As soon as the butter has melted and the water is boiling, add the flour all at once and beat with a wooden spoon until smooth.
Reduce the heat to low and beat until the dough pulls away from the sides of the pan and forms a ball. Stir over heat for 2 minutes to dry the dough slightly. Remove from heat and cool for 5 minutes.
Add one egg to dough and beat really well until incorporated and smooth. Repeat with remaining egg. Stir in cooked chorizo and mozzarella.
Using 2 spoons, drop dollops of the mixture onto trays. Flick a little water over them to help produce steam. Bake for 20 minutes until puffed and golden and serve immediately.
